name: StatusVol 2
author: fidele007
description: An updated and hopefully bug-free version of StatusVol 2. No new features will be included or should be expected. Tested on iOS 9.3.3, not tested on iOS 10.1.1. All credits to Steve Rolfe who brought this tweak to life.

0.0.8 (2016-01-04): Fix crashing bug in landscape mode if dynamic colors are enabled
